last_episode_to_air.name: Point of Origin
last_episode_to_air.overview: The team must race against the clock when one of them is kidnapped, and Onira-Tech is at risk of being destroyed.

name: Reverie
overview: A former detective specializing in human behavior is brought in when the launch of an advanced virtual reality program has dangerous and unintended consequences.

episodes.name: Pilot / Apertus
episodes.overview: When Charlie recruits former hostage negotiator Mara Kint to join the team at Onira-Tech, Mara  quickly learns the Reverie program and must use her negotiating skills to bring back a single  father who is addicted to the program and trapped inside.

episodes.name: Bond. Jane Bond.
episodes.overview: When a client becomes addicted to a “Jane Bond” adventure, Mara must help her assemble the missing pieces in her life to save her. At the same time, Mara deals with the unanticipated side effects of Reverie.

episodes.name: No More Mr. Nice Guy
episodes.overview: A family man robs banks in his Reverie and Mara must uncover the deeper reasons why. Mara’s derealizations put her life in danger.

episodes.name: Blue Is the Coldest Color
episodes.overview: Alexis' former partner warns Mara that Reverie 2.0 has some dangerous side effects; a BCI is stolen and Mara must go into a rogue Reverie.

episodes.name: Altum Somnum
episodes.overview: Monica Shaw seeks help from the team after a bombing kills dozens of people. Mara must dive into the mind of a coma victim to try and identify the perpetrator.

episodes.name: Pas de Deux
episodes.overview: Mara tries to save a young dancer whose recent tragedy has sent her spiraling into deep despair. The case leads Mara to a surprising reunion with Chris, the love she left when her life fell apart.

episodes.name: The Black Mandala
episodes.overview: The team works together to save the life of a wrongly imprisoned boy and Mara is introduced to the dangerous world of Dark Reveries where the normal rules don't apply.

episodes.name: Despedida
episodes.overview: Romance is in the air when Mara must track down an elderly woman attempting to relive her lost love, but as Mara dives deeper into her Reverie she realizes she may have a greater mission on her mind.

episodes.name: The Key
episodes.overview: Mara's personal tragedy finally comes to a head and she considers whether she has a future with OniraTech. When the client stuck in Reverie is one of their own, they must all band together before it's too late.

episodes.name: Point of Origin
episodes.overview: The team must race against the clock when one of them is kidnapped, and Onira-Tech is at risk of being destroyed.
